segments.text: good morning , Nathaniel . This is Leah calling from the International Student Office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: the reason I'm calling is because Ms . Collins will not be able to call you back until next week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh . I had hoped she would have called me back yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: she's terribly sorry about that . She had to leave the office suddenly and won't be able to return until next week . She hopes you understand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: is there someone else I can talk to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: she asked me to call you to book an appointment with someone else today . When are you free today ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: any time after 2 pm today would be good for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr . Liu is available at 2:15 today . Will that work for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd prefer to speak with Ms . Fonda .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid she isn't available this afternoon . She has an opening at 11:30 this morning . Will that work for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ok , we'll be expecting you at 11:30 . See you then .
segments.speaker: S2
